thread.title: Stephen Bear lets slip rumoured girlfriend Charlotte Crosby is "good at kissing" as their new MTV show gets start date
thread.title_full: Stephen Bear lets slip rumoured girlfriend Charlotte Crosby is "good at kissing" as their new MTV show gets start date

author: Lara Martin
title: Stephen Bear lets slip rumoured girlfriend Charlotte Crosby is "good at kissing" as their new MTV show gets start date
text:
Stephen Bear lets slip rumoured girlfriend Charlotte Crosby is "good at kissing" as their new MTV show gets start date They sparked romance rumours while filming MTV show Just Tattoo Of Us, which starts April 3 Share Charlotte Crosby And Stephen Bear Tease New MTV Show (Photo: MTV) Share Get   
Stephen Bear has let slip that Charlotte Crosby is “good at kissing” as rumours continue to swirl about the nature of their relationship. 
The pair sparked rumours of a romance when they began filming Just Tattoo Of Us, thanks to cosy social media posts including one showing them wearing His and Hers jumpers. 
While they’ve stayed coy about what exactly is going on, Bear has dropped his heaviest hint yet that it may not be an entirely platonic relationship. 
"Charlotte, honestly, it's nice 'cause she's fit. It helps, if she was ugly, I wouldn't really enjoy my time here,” he told MTV News . 
"And she's good at kissing… I've said too much!" Bear planted a kiss on Charlotte in the teaser clip (Photo: MTV) The show challenges people to let their loved ones design a tattoo (Photo: MTV) They've kept coy on dating rumours (Photo: MTV) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Bear Snapchats video of him pinching Charlotte Crosby's bum Share this video Watch Next 
Celebrity Big Brother winner Bear and former Geordie Shore star Charlotte co-host the new programme, which sees people getting tattooed by friends and family without knowing what the inking will look like. 
"There was lots of crazy moments in the show. One of the craziest things would probably be me physically attacking Bear after seeing what he did to us,” Charlotte told MTV. 
She declined to reveal just what Bear did, though, meaning we’ll have to tune in when the show kicks off on Monday, April 3 at 10pm to find out. They filmed the MTV show last year His and Hers jumpers suggested at romance (Photo: Instagram) 
The pair are currently on holiday together abroad; they jetted off together despite rumours circulating that Charlotte had ditched Bear because of his antics on E4’s Celebs Go Dating. 
Bear is signed up for the second series of the show, which sees celebrities trying to find love with regular members of the public. 
He hinted to Heat magazine earlier this month his role on Celebs Go Dating was a barrier to a relationship with Charlotte happening. 
“She’s funny, she’s witty, she’s clever, she’s independent - she’s got all the right attributes. It’s just the wrong time, because I’m filming the show,” he said. Bear focused his Snapchat camera on Charlotte's rear on Sunday night (Photo: Snapchat) He scribbled on her face at the bar (Photo: Snapchat) Playing games! (Photo: Snapchat) Bear certainly looks happy with Charlotte (Photo: Snapchat) 
But fans are still wondering after they jetted off on hols together, and appear to be staying at the same luxury hotel. 
Ever the tease, Bear has been posting numerous Snapchats from the vacation showing him with Charlotte, although he's either taken them from behind so you can't see her face or he's used a filter to scribble over it. 
Oh, Bear! 
Charlotte, meanwhile, appeared to hint people didn't know the full story when she cryptically tweeted: “I find it funny how many people are assuming/guessing/MAKING UP things about my life. 
“Different story every day. Cray cray.” Like us on Facebook
